scheduler.view
Class ViewInstructorFilter

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      scheduler.view.ViewInstructorFilter

public class ViewInstructorFilter
extends java.util.Observable

ViewInstructorFilter contains a list of InstructorFilterObj and information which instructors are displaying in the schedule view.

Author:
Sasiluk Ruangrongsorakai (sruangro@calpoly.edu)
